title: Ceiling, 1905–15
inscribed: Printed in selvedge: "Philadelphia" "New York" "Kayser & Allman" "Chicago" "Minneapolis" Pattern number "1130"
description: Alternating scroll medallions with three pink flowers and foliate vining medallions with two pink flowers; connected by flowers and foliate scrolls. Cream ground. Printed in piniks, green, white mica and gold mica. Printed in selvedge: "Philadelphia" "New York" "Kayser & Allman" "Chicago" "Minneapolis" Pattern number "1130"

tombstone.epitaph:
Ceiling, 1905–15.
1905–15. Machine-printed, mica, liquid. Gift of Victorian Collectibles. 1979-91-678.
